all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And in thy seed shall all the nations of the earth be blessed; because thou hast obeyed my voice.
Genesis 22:18
Quote of the Day
"The gospel of Jesus Christ is the plan of our Heavenly Father for the benefit of His spirit children."
President Dallin H. Oaks | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
